quote: Rich people believe: 'You create your own life.' Poor people believe: 'Life happens to you.'
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: How you do anything is how you do everything.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Money is a result, wealth is a result, health is a result, illness is a result, your weight is a result. We live in a world of cause and effect.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: If you want to change the fruits, you will first have to change the roots. If you want to change the visible, you must first change the invisible.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Rich people play the money game to win. Poor people play the money game not to lose.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: The number one reason most people don’t get what they want is that they don’t know what they want.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Don’t hope for wealth—design it.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Your income can only grow to the degree that you do.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Rich people focus on opportunities. Poor people focus on obstacles.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: You can be right or you can be rich—but not both.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: The size of your success is determined by the size of your belief.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Where attention goes, energy flows and results show.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Rich people think big. Poor people think small.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Every dollar you spend is a vote for the kind of world you want to live in.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: It’s not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The poor work for money. The rich have money work for them.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Wealth is not about having a lot of money; it’s about having a lot of options.
author: Chris Rock

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Grit is living life like it’s a marathon, not a sprint.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: Abundance is not about having more money. It’s about having more life.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: It’s not the employer who pays wages—he only handles the money. It is the product that pays wages.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: I never earned a dollar working for someone else in my life.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The habit of saving is itself an education; it fosters every virtue, teaches self-denial, cultivates the sense of order, trains to forethought.
author: T.T. Munger

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: The more you learn, the more you earn.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

quote: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
author: Philip Fisher

quote: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
author: P.T. Barnum

quote: The goal isn’t more money. The goal is living life on your terms.
author: Chris Brogan

quote: Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
author: Paul Clitheroe

quote: You can’t out-earn bad money habits.
author: David Bach

quote: The wealthy have small TVs and big libraries, while the poor have big TVs and small libraries.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you don’t design your own life plan, chances are you’ll fall into someone else’s plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Rich people constantly learn and grow. Poor people think they already know everything.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: The fastest way to become rich is to take 100% responsibility for your life.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Your ‘financial thermostat’ determines how much money you can comfortably earn and keep.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: If you’re not growing, you’re dying.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Money loves speed. The quicker you act on opportunities, the more money flows to you.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Think rich, act rich, be rich—starting now.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: The true measure of wealth is net worth, not income.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: You don’t have to be a genius to get rich—you just have to follow proven principles consistently.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Never depend on a single income. Make investment your second source.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The biggest risk of all is not taking one.
author: Mellody Hobson

quote: You can’t climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I made my first investment at age 11. I was hooked.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Don’t look for the needle in the haystack. Just build a better magnet.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Motivation gets you started. Habit keeps you going.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you really want to do something, you’ll find a way. If you don’t, you’ll find an excuse.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Wealth is the transfer of money from the impatient to the patient.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

quote: The moment you doubt whether you can do it, you’ve lost.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I’m convinced that about half of what separates successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Champions are made when nobody’s watching.
author: Anonymous

quote: Discipline equals freedom.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: The pain of discipline weighs ounces, but the pain of regret weighs tons.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You weren’t born to just pay bills and die.
author: Unknown

quote: The more abundant your thinking, the more abundant your life.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Riches begin in form of thought!
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire which transcends everything.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I’ve missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. Twenty-six times I’ve been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The most powerful force in the universe is compound interest.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Financial peace isn’t the acquisition of stuff. It’s learning to live on less than you make.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
author: Herbert Kaufman

quote: Grit is that ‘extra something’ that separates the most successful people from the rest.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody’s going to know whether you did it or not.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: Seneca

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: It’s not about ideas. It’s about making ideas happen.
author: Scott Belsky

quote: Rich people manage their money well. Poor people mismanage their money.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Money is not the root of all evil—ignorance about money is.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: You don’t have to be rich to start, but you do have to start to be rich.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success is 99% failure.
author: Soichiro Honda

quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
author: Rob Siltanen

quote: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Diversification is protection against ignorance. It makes little sense if you know what you are doing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you’re doing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
author: Robert Arnott

quote: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
author: Ben Graham

quote: The biggest mistake investors make is trying to time the market.
author: Ray Dalio

quote: Pain + Reflection = Progress.
author: Ray Dalio

quote: Money is a tool. Used properly, it can build a meaningful life. Used improperly, it can destroy you.
author: Mel Robbins

quote: Your bank account is a report card on your ability to solve problems.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Revenue solves all problems.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Discipline is remembering what you want.
author: David Campbell

quote: Small daily improvements are the key to staggering long-term results.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Set a goal that makes you want to jump out of bed in the morning.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: Abundance flows to those who appreciate what they already have.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: He who buys what he does not need steals from himself.
author: Swedish Proverb

quote: A person’s financial situation is rarely a result of random luck—it’s a reflection of their habits.
author: Darren Hardy

quote: The compound effect is the principle of reaping huge rewards from a series of small, smart choices.
author: Darren Hardy

quote: You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it.
author: Charles Buxton

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Grit is having the courage to push through, no matter what the obstacles are, because it’s worth it.
author: Chris Morris

quote: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: Don’t confuse being busy with being productive.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The currency of the new economy is trust.
author: Seth Godin

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t—you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The more you sweat in training, the less you bleed in battle.
author: Anonymous

quote: Excellence is not a singular act, but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
author: Shaun T

quote: Make your mind your greatest asset—not your biggest liability.
author: Ed Mylett

quote: Your income grows when you solve bigger problems for more people.
author: Ed Mylett

quote: You don’t know me, son! You don’t know what I’m capable of!
author: David Goggins

quote: The most powerful word in the English language is ‘yet.’
author: David Goggins

quote: You are in danger of living a life so comfortable and soft that you will die without ever realizing your true potential.
author: David Goggins

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: David Goggins

quote: The only way to build mental toughness is to put yourself in situations that make you uncomfortable.
author: David Goggins

quote: You’re the only one who can change your life. No one’s coming to save you.
author: David Goggins

quote: Suffering is the secret ingredient to growth.
author: David Goggins

quote: Calloused minds come from calloused souls.
author: David Goggins

quote: You have to be willing to suffer to get better.
author: David Goggins

quote: Accountability is the glue that ties commitment to results.
author: David Goggins

quote: Motivation is crap. Motivation comes and goes. When you’re driven, whatever is in front of you will get destroyed.
author: David Goggins

quote: We’re all lazy. The key is to find your why so you can override that laziness.
author: David Goggins

quote: You’re not tired. You’re just comfortable.
author: David Goggins

quote: The mind is the most powerful weapon you have. But you’ve got to train it like a muscle.
author: David Goggins

quote: Stop talking. Start doing.
author: David Goggins

quote: You don’t rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your training.
author: David Goggins

quote: Hard work is the great equalizer.
author: David Goggins

quote: Pain is weakness leaving the body.
author: David Goggins

quote: You have to be willing to look in the mirror and tell yourself the truth.
author: David Goggins

quote: No one cares about your excuses. Not even your mom.
author: David Goggins

quote: Get comfortable being uncomfortable.
author: David Goggins

quote: You’re not special. You’re not unique. You’re just another human being who needs to put in the work.
author: David Goggins

quote: The only thing you’re entitled to is what you earn.
author: David Goggins

quote: If you want greatness, you can’t be OK with being average.
author: David Goggins

quote: You don’t need more time. You need more discipline.
author: David Goggins

quote: Discipline equals freedom.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It’s about taking care of those in your charge.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Extreme ownership means you take 100% responsibility for everything in your world.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: When things go wrong—and they will—look in the mirror first.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: The more you sweat in training, the less you bleed in battle.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: There are no shortcuts. The only way is hard work.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Don’t quit. Suck it up. Get after it.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Good. Bad. I’m the guy who makes the difference.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: You can’t control the situation, but you can control your response to it.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Stay humble. Work hard. Be kind.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: The more you prepare, the luckier you get.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: If you want to be a leader, you must first learn to follow.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Victory is reserved for those who are willing to pay its price.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Don’t wait for motivation. Discipline is what gets the job done.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: The path to success is paved with discipline, not desire.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: No plan survives first contact with the enemy. Adapt and overcome.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: You don’t rise to the occasion—you sink to the level of your training.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Sacrifice. That’s what separates the winners from the losers.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Be humble in victory. Be resilient in defeat.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: The more you give, the more you get.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Train hard. Fight easy.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Success is not an accident. It’s hard work, perseverance, and sacrifice.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Take ownership of your life. No one else will.
author: Jocko Willink
